remarks: The product of two diagonal matrices is a diagonal matrix.  (Contributed by AV, 20-Aug-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 18-Dec-2019.)
statement:
dmatid.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
dmatid.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
dmatid.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
dmatid.d $e |- D = ( N DMat R ) $.
dmatmulcl $p |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( X e. D /\ Y e. D ) ) -> ( X ( .r ` A ) Y ) e. D ) $.
